== Identification Plates ==

Following the most imperative state that a signal can present, a corresponding '''identification plate''' may bear one of the following inscriptions in black letters on a white background:

{| class="wikitable"
!Inscription
!Description
|-
|{{TagValue|railway:signal:distant:plates|FR:D}}
|[[OpenRailwayMap/Tagging in France#Disque|Disque]] signal.
|-
|{{TagValue|railway:signal:distant:plates|FR:A}}
|[[OpenRailwayMap/Tagging in France#Avertissement|Avertissement]].
|}
